name: Punch Pad Workout
description: This is a workout plus memorization game, where the player must punch the pads, in the correct order that each combination is called out, over 3 rounds.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 or newer Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: HTC Vive required
